description: Claim your free World Of Warships Godzilla vs. Kong Supply Drop key! Each Supply Drop key unlocks 10 of each themed Monster camouflages.
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the butto to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: World of Warships: HUGE BONUSES Code
description:
This is the best time to jump into World of Warships! Claim the code below and unlock HUGE BONUSES including 2,5 million credits, 200 doubloons, 7 days of premium, 2 cruisers (St. Louis and Emden) plus 20X camouflage restless fire! It's crazy! Please note this code is for new players only.

Code: BOOM
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the World of Warships page.
2. Click the button and enter your new account details.
3. On the sign up page, click the "Have an invite code?" link and insert the code if not there already. (The code should be added automatically if you followed our link) That's it!

title: Magic: The Gathering Arena - 5 Card Sleeves
description:
Use the codes below and unlock 5 Card Sleeves for Magic: The Gathering Arena!

Codes:

ArtClub - (Prismari Sleeve)
RockJocks - (Lorehold Sleeve)
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" to visit the game page and create your account if you don't have one.
2. Start the game and on the home screen click Store
3. In the top right corner, click "Redeem Code" window.
4. Enter the code there. Be careful to correctly use uppercase and lowercase

title: World of Tanks: 600 Gold + Tank Invite Code
description: Claim this free World of Tanks invite code and unlock a Tank T-1271 or a Tank M22 Locust plus 600 Gold without any cost! You just need to follow the instructions below! Please note this invite codes are for new players only!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the World of Tanks page and activate the code automatically.
2. Click the button and enter your new account details.
3. That's it, the bonus will be added to your account automatically.

*Please note these are not Steam keys, if you pick the Steam version please follow the instructions and redeem the key inside the game.

2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

description: Grab this DLC for FREE until the end of May! Please note the base game is required (free to play) to play this DLC content.

2. Install the DLC before the offer expires.

title: Payday 2: Free In-game Items Giveaway
description: OVERKILL is giving away free in-game items for Payday 2! You just need to complete some easy steps to unlock several in-game items including masks, hats and more!
instructions:

2. Select your favorite in-game items.
3. Complete the steps to unlock your in-game items!

instructions:
